name: Accessing WinAPI in PowerShell for Credentials Dumping
description: Detects Accessing to lsass.exe by Powershell
query: (winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Sysmon\/Operational AND event.code:(8 OR 10) AND process.executable:(/.*\\[Pp][Oo][Ww][Ee][Rr][Ss][Hh][Ee][Ll][Ll]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Pp][Ww][Ss][Hh]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/) AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:/.*\\[Ll][Ss][Aa][Ss][Ss]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Sysmon\/Operational AND event.code:(8 OR 10) AND process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND winlog.event_data.TargetImage:*\\lsass.exe)`
